Class HumanArt

  • java.lang.Object
    • HumanArt
  • public class HumanArt
extends java.lang.Object
    This program prints an ASCII art image that I made on my own. The image is an awkward guy with curly hair and bucked teeth. He reminds me of myself as a child before braces. This is for the HumanArt, Project 1, for CSC116. I tried to limit redundancy and empty spaces by using printf statements. In doing this I created parameter methods that returned a String so I could make shorter/neater printf statements. I made for loops for repeating segments, even if there were only two lines so I could add a SCALE constant where you could easily change the height of the figure.
    Version:
    23Jan2020
    Author:
    Zach Giles
